data.text:
@Red_Hussaini bandages might pull on the wound and cause pain. So I usually use Mepore 9x25 ones, even though the hole is only like an inch wide or so at this point.

Again: Really sorry for the terseness last night 🙏🏾

@Red_Hussaini infection, etc, the skin is pink and healthy,  nerve cells are forming again, and the whole thing will heal in a month or so. Bandages have to be changed every 2-3 days, and I use bigger surgical bandages than necessary because I'm a wuss who thinks that removing smaller surgical

@Red_Hussaini I was angry at something else last night and ended up taking it out on you for no reason at all, and I'm so sorry.

In the beginning,  it was treated aggressively with oral and topical antibiotics, along with debridement of dead cells. It is much better now, no cellulitis, no
@potaydur that I know but as a physician couldn’t resist… I know you didn’t ask and I take back my unsolicited advice!
@Red_Hussaini Nowhere in my post was I asking for or seeking medical advice sir.
@potaydur did you show it to any doctor… this may require some careful treatment so that it doesn’t spread or get bad
